price: 5 Noé dit : « Seigneur ! J’ai prêché mon peuple nuit et jour,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
